SEARCH

SlimeLib - Javadocs

Package
Description
me.phoenix.slimelib
 
me.phoenix.slimelib.config
Contains multiple utilities for handling configs.
me.phoenix.slimelib.inventory
Contains API to create custom inventory menus.
me.phoenix.slimelib.inventory.handler
Contains handlers to listen to certain events.
me.phoenix.slimelib.item
Utilities for handling ItemStacks.
me.phoenix.slimelib.metrics
Utilities for bStats metrics service.
me.phoenix.slimelib.metrics.chart
Contains different types of modes for representing data.
me.phoenix.slimelib.metrics.chart.bar
Contains different types of bar charts for representing data.
me.phoenix.slimelib.metrics.chart.line
Contains different types of line charts for representing data.
me.phoenix.slimelib.metrics.chart.pie
Contains different types of pie charts for representing data.
me.phoenix.slimelib.metrics.object
Contains API to create a simple JSON object.
me.phoenix.slimelib.other
Generic utilities that do not belong in any other category.
me.phoenix.slimelib.slimefun
Utilities for Slimefun API.
me.phoenix.slimelib.slimefun.block
Contains API to create custom blocks with UI.
me.phoenix.slimelib.slimefun.block.container
Utilities for managing a uniform block UI throughout all addons.
me.phoenix.slimelib.slimefun.electric
Modularized implementations of AContainer and AGenerator.
me.phoenix.slimelib.slimefun.item
Classes to quickly implement a certain interface.
me.phoenix.slimelib.slimefun.recipe
Utilities for creating recipe shapes which are used often.
me.phoenix.slimelib.visual
Utilities to create visual effects using particles.
me.phoenix.slimelib.world
Utilities for world and location management.
